column4: Hey guys, I'm trying (desperately) to play a DVD in my laptop, but it keeps on failing in NUMEROUS players.  VLC, Gnome, Totem, Kaffeine, etc.  It's a brand new DVD out of the box.  I believe the problem is stupid copy protection.  Can I watch this movie I paid for????
once that and dma settings are right you are good to go...should have a script for you in the wiki
